snippet: A lawyer for Monroe Beachy, owner of an investment company, said he intended to plead guilty to defrauding fellow Amish out of nearly $17 million.
abstract: Lawyer for Monroe L Beachy says his client plans to plead guilty to defrauding fellow Amish in 29 states out of nearly $17 million; he faces up to 20 years in prison.
lead_paragraph: A lawyer for Monroe Beachy, owner of an investment company, said he intended to plead guilty to defrauding fellow Amish out of nearly $17 million.

headline.seo: Ohio Man Set to Plead Guilty to Defrauding Amish
headline.main: Guilty Plea Expected in Amish Case
headline.print_headline: Guilty Plea Expected in Amish Case
